title: How to Improve Memory & Focus Using Science Protocols | Dr. Charan Ranganath

questions.question: What neurotransmitter is released in specific brain areas to enhance memory and learning?
questions.explanation: Dopamine is specifically released in areas of the brain that facilitate learning and memory processes.

questions.question: According to Dr. Charan Ranganath, what practice can enhance memory retention during learning experiences?
questions.explanation: Maintaining curiosity about a topic leads to increased dopamine release, which enhances the ability to remember related information.

questions.question: What brain region is primarily responsible for forming memories that connect specific experiences to their context?
questions.explanation: The hippocampus plays a critical role in forming episodic memories by linking experiences to their contextual details.
